events.name: Global Azure Bootcamp in Singapore
events.description: Welcome to Global Azure Bootcamp! On, Saturday, April 25, 2015 we are out to set some records again! In April of 2013 we held the first Global Windows Azure Bootcamp at more than 90 locations around the globe! In March 2014 we topped that with 136 locations! This year we are again doing a one day deep dive class to help thousands of people get up to speed on developing Cloud Computing Applications for Azure. In addition to this great learning opportunity we will have another set of hands on labs. Not sure what yet, but to give you an idea: in 2014 we pooled a huge global compute farm to perform diabetes research. Lot's of Lucky Draw Prizes !!! "Surface Pro 3" and many more... Lucky Draw Prizes... and more surprise take-aways..
events.location: Microsoft Singapore, One Marina Boulevard, Level 22, Meeting Room

events.name: New Pilot Experience 2015 (Singapore)-25 April 2015, Saturday, 1:45pm
events.description:
This is a workshop for RC hobbyist and aerial enthustists. There will be a introduction of the latest features and functionality with the latest Phantom. 
There would also be a showcase of the latest member of the DJI Family, Phantom 3. 
  
FAQs 
Is this the same place as the event held in November last year? 
NO. It is a different location. This event is held at "The Auditorium" on Singapore Polytechnic Campus. 
  
 What are my transport/parking options getting to the event? 
If you are driving to the event, please consider to park at the nearest car park is E-3, E-4 or E-5. 
If you are coming by MRT, please take to Dover MRT and cross the bridge to Singapore Polytechnic. The Auditorium is about 50m along the path after the bridge. 
If you are coming by Bus, please take the following buses: 
14, 74, 105, 147, 166 or 185 
 to the nearest bus stop number#19041. 
  
Where can I contact the organizer with any questions? 
Please send your questions to sales@singahobby.com or call us at +65 65321993. 
  
Is my registration/ticket transferrable or refundable? 
The tickets are NOT transferrable or refundable. Sorry. 
  
Do I have to bring my printed ticket to the event? 
Having the ticket would surely speed up our registration process. However to save paper and printing, please show us a print screen or imaginery of the event ticket will suffice.
events.location: Singapore Polytechnic - The Auditorium, , 500 Dover Road, Singapore 139651
events.group_name: DJI Innovations and Singapore Hobby Supplies Pte Ltd
